FuncDef: This command request initial certificate from CA by using CMPv2 initial registration procedure.
CLIs: initial-registration ca <ca-profile-name> key-to-certify <key-filename> protection-alg { password <password> reference <ref-number> | signature [ cert <cert-file-name> [ send-chain [ with-ca <ca-profile-name> ] ] ] [ protection-key <key-file-name> ] [ hash-alg { md5 | sha1 | sha224 | sha256 | sha384 | sha512 } ] } subject-dn <dn> [ domain-name <domain-names> ] [ ip-addr <ip-address> | <ipv6-address> ] save-as <save-path-of-result-cert>

ParaDef.Info: Specifies a ca-profile name which includes CMP server information up to 32 characters.
Specifies the file name of the key to certify up to 95 characters.
Specifies an ASCII string up to 64 characters.
Specifies the reference number for this CA initial authentication key up to 64 characters.
specifies the certificate file up to 95 characters.
Specifies the protection key associated with the action on the CA profile.
Specifies the hash algorithm for RSA key. Values-md5,sha1,sha224,sha256,sha384,sha512.
Specifies the subject of the requesting certificate up to 256 characters. Values-attr1 equals val1.
Specifies the save full path name of saving the result certificate up to 200 characters.
Specifies FQDNs for SubjectAltName of the requesting certificate, separated by commas, up to 512 characters.
Specifies an IPv4 or IPv6 address for SubjectAtName of the requesting certificate.
